meanings.definition: The floor structure immediately underlying the finish flooring.
meanings.sent1: The subfloor supports the top flooring.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check for any damage to the subfloor before installing new carpet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the subfloor was a great place to hide its toys.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sturdy as a well-built subfloor.
meanings.sent5: The subfloor, like a hidden foundation, quietly holds up the room above.

meanings.sent1: We need to subfloor the room before laying down the new tiles.
meanings.sent2: Contractors will subfloor the area to ensure a level surface for the hardwood flooring.
meanings.sent3: He decided to subfloor the garage with extra care, knowing it would make a big difference.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the glue used to subfloor the entire house.
meanings.sent5: The team worked together to subfloor the stage, preparing it for the grand performance.
